alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 27 at 11:25PM EDT until September 28 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bullitt County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Hardin County in central Kentucky... * Until midnight EDT. * At 1124 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Shepherdsville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shepherdsville, Lebanon Junction, Bardstown Junction, Belmont, Clermont, Pitts Point, Colesburg, Beech Grove and Fort Knox. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Louisville. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
